6.title: Australia Day Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The Professor presents the 1971 movie "Lady Frankenstein" and the 1903 silent movie "Alice in Wonderland".

7.title: Valentine's Day Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The Professor presents the 1973 movie "The Werewolf of Washington" and the 1914 movie "His Prehistoric Past" on Valentine's Day.

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The Professor presents the 1976 movie "Return of the Kung Fu Dragon" and the 1904 movie "Tchin-Chao, the Chinese Conjuror" on Chinese New Year.

9.title: LGBTQI Mardi Gras Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The Professor presents the LGBTQI Mardi Gras Special 2018 featuring featuring the 1966 movie "Queen of Blood" and the 1908 movie "The Magic Mirror".

10.title: Saint Patrick's Day Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The Professor presents the Saint Patrick's Day Special 2018 featuring featuring the 1963 "Dementia 13", followed by the 1929 silent movie "Ghosts Before Breakfast".

11.title: Atom Age Vampire (On The Vortexx)

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Roland Barnes' Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials"; and presenting "Atom Age Vampire" starring Alberto Lupo.

12.title: Easter Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: The Professor's presents the 1978 movie "Vampire Hookers" followed by the 1903 Georges Méliès movie "Le Monstre" (The Monster).

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

14.title: The Last Man on Earth (On The Vortexx)

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: The Professor presents the Vincent Price movie "The Last Man on Earth", as well as rare clips of Ian Bannerman as Deadly Earnest. Witch Cinders presents some old scary commercials featuring Vincent Price.

15.title: ANZAC Day Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: The Professor presents the 1955 Czechoslovakian movie "Cesta do praveku" (A Journey to the Beginning of Time) and the 1910 movie "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz".

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The Professor presents "Never Fear Smith is Here!", an evening with Jonathan Harris that was filmed when Harris visited Australia in 1994, followed by the 1933 short "The Devil's Ball".

19.plot: The Professor presents the movie "The Fatal Hour" starring Boris Karlof.

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: The Professor in presenting the right royal 1966 movie "The She Beast" and the 1912 movie "Dr. Jekyll and Mr Hyde"; screened by Chuck, the Projectionist.

21.title: War of the Planets (On The Vortexx)

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: The Professor presents the 1978 movie "Cosmos: War of the Planets" starring John Richardson.

22.title: Day of the Seafarers Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Join the Professor in presenting the all at sea 1939 movie "Torture Ship" and the 1904 movie "Le Voyage A Travers L'Impossible".

23.title: Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet (On The Vortexx)

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: A look at Jill Forster as "Vampira", this week's features "Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet", Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials", and "Col Briscoe Adventurer, Chapter 9 the Giant Lizards of Connine Island".

24.title: Independence Day Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Celebrate your independence with the Professor in presenting the revolutionary movie "Revolt of the Zombies" and the 1920 silent movie "Genuine: The Tragedy of a Vampire"; screened by Chuck, the Projectionist.

25.title: Bastille Day Special 2018

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Be part of the revolution, by joining the Professor as he presents the 1949 movie "The Phantom Creeps" and the French 1909 silent movie "The Panicky Picnic".

26.title: Halloween Special (On The Vortexx)

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: The Professor presents the classic zombie movie "Night of the Living Dead".

1.title: Atom Age Vampire

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Roland Barnes' Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials"; and presenting "Atom Age Vampire" starring Alberto Lupo.

2.title: The Last Man on Earth

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Ian Bannerman's Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials"; and presenting "The Last Man on Earth" starring Vincent Price.

3.title: The Ape

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Ralph Baker's Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials". Interview with Susan Batho from Australian Star Trek fan fame; presenting "The Ape" starring Boris Karloff.

4.title: The Wasp Woman

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Shane Porteous' Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials". Presenting the movie "The Wasp Woman" starring Susan Cabot. Col also gets up to no good.

5.title: White Zombie

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Hedley Cullen's Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials". Presenting the movie "White Zombie" starring Bela Lugosi; Doctor Who Festival report.

6.title: The Phantom from 10,000 Leagues

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: A look at John Dommett's Professor Macarbe; "The Phantom From 10000 Leagues" starring Kent Taylor ; the 3rd place winner of the Con 9 short movie competition "Somewhere in the CCCP"; and Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials".

7.title: Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: A look at Jill Forster as "Vampira", this week's features "Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet", Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials", and "Col Briscoe Adventurer, Chapter 9 the Giant Lizards of Connine Island".

8.title: House on Haunted Hill

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: "House on Haunted Hill" starring Vincent Price. Horror Host Tome presenting Anthony Quayle - host of "The Evil Touch"; Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials", with Scotty MacProfessor at Oz Comic Con 2015.

9.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Featuring the 1964 movie "Santa Claus Conquers the Martians" with Pia Zadora. Horror Host Tome presenting Peter Goers, host of "Fright Night"; Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials"; and Christmas greetings from Susan Batho and Graeme Batho.

10.title: Horrors of Spider Island

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Featured movie "Horrors of Spider Island" directed by Fritz Böttger. Horror Host Tome presenting Cassandra Peterson of "Elvira's Thriller Theatre"; Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials"; and New Year's Eve greetings Sue and Graeme Batho.

11.title: Dead Men Walk

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Feature the 1943 movie "Dead Men Walk", starring George Zucco. Other features include Horror Host Tome presenting Robert Mascara as Fosdyke, host of the fictional "Good Morning Tombstones"; Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials".

12.title: The Giant Gila Monster

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Featured movie the 1959 "The Giant Gila Monster". Also Horror Host Tome presenting Tabitha Cutterbuck, host of "Graveyard Shift"; Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials"; as well as Col The Adventurer and Chuck the Projectionist.

13.title: The Mad Monster

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Featuring the 1942 "The Mad Monster". Other features include Horror Host Tome presenting Nigel Honeybone, host of "The Schlocky Horror Picture Show"; Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials"; Col The Adventurer and Chuck the Projectionist.

14.title: The Fatal Hour

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Featured movie "The Fatal Hour", starring Boris Karlof. Also Horror Host Tome presenting Robert Muldoon as Count Robula, host of "The Friday Frights", Witch Cinders' "Creepy Commercials"; as well as the regulars.

15.title: Cosmos: War of the Planets

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Featured movie the 1978 "Cosmos: War of the Planets", starring John Richardson. Horror Host Tome presenting Jack Hardy as Deadly Ernest for the "Deadly Ernest Horror Show" (UK), and the cast and crew performing the "Monster Mash".

16.title: The Ape (On The Eerie Late Night)

episode of.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Regular segments - "Horror Host Tome" looking at Ralph Baker's Deadly Earnest character; and "Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials". Interview with Susan Batho from Australian Star Trek fan fame; presenting "The Ape" starring Boris Karloff.

color info: Black and White::(Black & White and Color)
imdb.plot outline: The series revolves around The Professor, Scotty MacProfessor, Col - The Adventurer and Chuck, The Projectionist who are trapped in an alternate universe. The only way back home is to screen and present a certain old horror movie, but which one. The movie vault will only allow one movie per week to be taken out. Each episode also includes Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials, as well as Horror Host Tome - which a different horror host is presented. Special guests, and news reports are also shown.
imdb.title: The Professor's Scary Movie Show
plot: A web based hosted horror movie show, with Paul Gerard Kennedy as "The Professor".::Paul Gerard Kennedy

The series revolves around The Professor, Scotty MacProfessor, Col - The Adventurer and Chuck, The Projectionist who are trapped in an alternate universe. The only way back home is to screen and present a certain old horror movie, but which one. The movie vault will only allow one movie per week to be taken out. Each episode also includes Witch Cinders' Creepy Commercials, as well as Horror Host Tome - which a different horror host is presented. Special guests, and news reports are also shown.::Paul Gerard Kennedy
